title: Introduction to Management of Technology I
description: Addresses strategic, engineering, marketing, and financial processes and tools for the management, development, and commercialization of high-tech products. Declared TIM majors must concurrently enroll in TIM 172P to fulfill the capstone series. (Formerly CSE 171A.)

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): MATH 19B or MATH 11B or AM 11B or ECON 11B.
